site.title: HTML to Image SSE Service
site.copyright: © 2023 HTML to Image Service. All rights reserved.

header.title: HTML to Image Conversion Service
header.subtitle: Transform your HTML content into high-quality images with our SSE-powered service

integration.title: Easy Integration
integration.description: Our service uses Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time communication, making it easy to integrate with your existing applications.

quality.title: High-Quality Images
quality.description: Convert any HTML or SVG content into PNG, JPEG, or WebP images with customizable dimensions and quality settings.

free.title: Free to Use
free.description: Our service is currently free to use. If you find it valuable, consider supporting the project with a small donation.

tryDemo.title: Try Our Demo
tryDemo.description: Experience the HTML-to-Image conversion service with our interactive demo. Create beautiful images from your HTML content in seconds.

feature1.title: Live Preview
feature1.description: See your HTML rendered as an image in real-time

feature2.title: Customizable
feature2.description: Adjust dimensions and format to your needs

feature3.title: Edit HTML
feature3.description: Modify the HTML content directly in the editor

apiInfo.title: API Information
apiInfo.description: Use our MCP service to convert HTML to images programmatically.

support.title: Support This Project
support.description: This service is currently free to use. If you find it valuable for your projects, please consider buying me a coffee!
support.supportMessage: Your support helps keep this service running and enables future improvements.

preview.title: Image Preview
preview.initialMessage: Your converted image will appear here
